notes.text:
After getting to my KoG rank up match three times and ending up in legend 1 using balance I switched to weevil GB and never ranked down with it.

Benefits of weevil:
- surprise factor. Opponents often attacked set GB which can be game winning.
- skip opponents draw phase can be huge 
- parasite is a great attack target even for murmillo
- forces a face up monster on opponents side. Makes e-con take with golem easy
- reduces tea burn consistency by making deck 21/22 cards
-1000 damage can win games.

Downside of weevil:
- lower starting hand consistency vs balance but I only bricked twice. GB has good brick recovery.
- not as much burn potential as shadow game
- harder to play around back row without minds can but not an issue if you note prompts.
